timeline.bodyText: Should core and annotations be the same version?
timeline.author: kennknowles

replies.bodyText: They (versions) are already different in master but I see no problem to align them.
replies.author: pawelpasterz

timeline.bodyText: This version looks very "interesting". Can you add a comment so someone who sees it can understand what is going on?
timeline.author: kennknowles

replies.bodyText: Sure, this version is taken directly from EP plugin documentation, support for JDK 8 section to be specific. I'll add comment with short description and link
replies.author: pawelpasterz

timeline.message: Aling EP core and annotations versions
